casebody.data:
Kenny BLANKS v. STATE of Mississippi. No. 54995. Supreme Court of Mississippi. Aug. 1, 1984. Gene Brown, Meridian, for appellant. Bill Allain, Atty. Gen., by Robert D. Findley, Sp. Asst. Atty. Gen., Jackson, for appellee. Before ROY NOBLE LEE, P.J. and ROBERTSON and SULLIVAN, JJ.

Rehearing Denied Sept. 26, 1984.
